solution_line_template: In an hour, the baker bakes {loaves_per_hour} x {ovens} = <<{loaves_per_hour}*{ovens}={loaves_per_hour_total}>>{loaves_per_hour_total} loaves of bread.
From Monday to Friday, he bakes {weekday_hours} x {loaves_per_hour_total} = <<{weekday_hours}*{loaves_per_hour_total}={weekday_loaves_per_day}>>{weekday_loaves_per_day} loaves of bread per day.
From Monday to Friday, he bakes a total of {weekday_loaves_per_day} x {weekdays} = <<{weekday_loaves_per_day}*{weekdays}={weekday_loaves_total}>>{weekday_loaves_total} loaves of bread.
On Saturday and Sunday, he bakes {weekend_hours} x {loaves_per_hour_total} = <<{weekend_hours}*{loaves_per_hour_total}={weekend_loaves_per_day}>>{weekend_loaves_per_day} loaves of bread per day.
On Saturday and Sunday, he bakes a total of {weekend_loaves_per_day} x {weekend_days} = <<{weekend_loaves_per_day}*{weekend_days}={weekend_loaves_total}>>{weekend_loaves_total} loaves of bread.
In a week, he bakes {weekday_loaves_total} + {weekend_loaves_total} = <<{weekday_loaves_total}+{weekend_loaves_total}={loaves_per_week}>>{loaves_per_week} loaves of bread.
In 3 weeks, he bakes {loaves_per_week} x {weeks} = <<{loaves_per_week}*{weeks}={total_loaves}>>{total_loaves} loaves of bread.
